title.narrative: (Love Alliance) Grantmaking - Nigeria / Octroi de subvention - Nigéria

description.narrative: Grantmaking to local partners in Nigeria to implement advocacy and community organizing to advance SRHR
Octroi de subventions aux partenaires locaux au Nigéria pour la réalisation d’activités de plaidoyer et de mobilisation communautaire pour avancer les SDSR

title.narrative: Diverse KP communities are organised and meaningfully inclusive and have strengthened their capacity to claim their rights and freedoms.
Les diverses communautés de la province du Kansas sont organisées et intégrées de manière significative et ont renforcé leur capacité à revendiquer leurs droits et libertés.
Indicateurs de l'Alliance de l'amour et liens avec les indicateurs du panier du Ministère des Affaires étrangères -MoFA-.
Love Alliance indicators and links with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs -MoFA- basket indicators
Nombre d'organisations de la société civile et d'organisations dirigées par la communauté ayant une capacité accrue à défendre les droits des populations clés.
Number of civil society organisations and community led organisations with increased capacity to advocate for the rights of key populations

description.narrative: # Nombre d'OSC dirigées par des femmes et des jeunes ayant des capacités accrues en matière de L&A
# of Women- and youth-led CSOs with increased L&A capacities

comment.narrative: Organizing amongst these communities have evolved over the last decade, with the LGBTIQ+ and sex worker community being more organised relative to the PWUD community (Context Analysis, 2021). Across the country, there are more than 30 LGBTIQ+ organisations, 20 Sex workers organisations, and 15 PWUD organisations. The data collected from the Love Alliance will allow to identify CSOs by age, community they represent and define which are women-led.
Il s'agit de l'objectif pour cinq ans, de 2021 à 2025.
This is the target for five year starting from 2021 to 2025

ISDAO provided direct support to organisations in the development of their initiatives based on the needs they have identified at concept note stage. We adopted the use of concept notes to understand what the needs and proposed solutions were and based on pre-approval by the LAGMP, we worked with each partner to strengthen their capacity. These 27 organisations pre-approved by LAGMP were supported and guided on how to develop their full proposals (with work plans and financial budgets) that clearly articulated the needs and their strategies to meet the needs of their respective communities. All the grantees received this capacity strengthening before their grants were finalized and awarded to them. Furthermore, ISDAO introduced an approach to enable organizations to apply for core support, separately from project requests. Twenty-seven (27) organizations were provided grants either as core support (solely for organizational strengthening) or both core and project support to enable them respond to their respective organizational strengthening needs and the needs of their target communities. For instance, we had some emerging organisation/ groups from the 27 grantees who are now able to secure office spaces for their work including community centres and safe houses for community members. Some other were able to procure equipment (laptops, printers, etc) to support their work – Initiative for Health and Equality, TAHRA Initiative, Equitable health for Women and Empowerment Initiative, CHGHI. We also had grantees who were able to hire consultants to support them with capacity strengthening in the areas of organizational administration and management and effective project implementation – Intersex Nigeria, CoWHRI, AdvoPride, The Rainbow Alive Initiative but to mention a few. Grantees are progressing from being able to clearly articulate their advocacy initiatives to being able to efficiently use tools that will allow for result/impact measurement and technical/financial reporting to donors and/or other partners. This activity didn’t required spending, but staff time were utilised to achieve the result

title.narrative: Key populations have access to inclusive, non-judgemental, gender-sensitive people-centred accountable and comprehensive HIV and SRH services that are adequately and sustainably resourced.

Les populations clés ont accès à des services de VIH et de SSR inclusifs, sans jugement, sexospécifiques, axés sur les personnes, responsables et complets, et dotés de ressources adéquates et durables.
Indicateurs de l'Alliance de l'amour et liens avec les indicateurs du panier du Ministère des Affaires étrangères -MoFA-.
Love Alliance indicators and links with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs -MoFA- basket indicators
# Nombre de politiques/lois/stratégies actuellement mises en œuvre pour répondre aux besoins des populations clés grâce à la contribution du programme.
# of policies/laws/strategies currently being implemented to meet the needs of key populations as a result of programme contribution

Civic space and freedoms of key populations and civil society actors are preserved and expanded, and progress is made towards decriminalisation of sex work, marginalised gender identities, same-sex relationships, HIV and the possession and use of drugs.

L'espace civique et les libertés des populations clés et des acteurs de la société civile sont préservés et étendus, et des progrès sont réalisés en matière de dépénalisation du travail sexuel, des identités de genre marginalisées, des relations homosexuelles, du VIH et de la possession et de la consommation de drogues.
Indicateurs de l'Alliance de l'amour et liens avec les indicateurs du panier du Ministère des Affaires étrangères -MoFA-.
Love Alliance indicators and links with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs -MoFA- basket indicators

# Nombre de politiques officiellement proposées/acceptées (projets de loi, obligations, mesures de vote, règlements, politiques administratives, etc.) liées à l'espace et aux libertés civiques ou à la (dé)criminalisation.
# of Policies formally proposed/accepted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies etc.) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation
Key population movements are capable, inclusive, influential and mutually supportive
Les principaux mouvements de population sont capables, inclusifs, influents et se soutiennent mutuellement.
Indicateurs de l'Alliance de l'amour et liens avec les indicateurs du panier du Ministère des Affaires étrangères -MoFA-.
Love Alliance indicators and links with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs -MoFA- basket indicators
Key populations effectively use accountability mechanisms towards SRHR
Les populations clés utilisent efficacement les mécanismes de responsabilisation en matière de SDSR

Civic space and freedoms of key populations and civil society actors are preserved and expanded, and progress is made towards decriminalisation of sex work, marginalised gender identities, same-sex relationships, HIV and the possession and use of drugs.

L'espace civique et les libertés des populations clés et des acteurs de la société civile sont préservés et étendus, et des progrès sont réalisés en matière de dépénalisation du travail sexuel, des identités de genre marginalisées, des relations homosexuelles, du VIH et de la possession et de la consommation de drogues.
Indicateurs de l'Alliance de l'amour et liens avec les indicateurs du panier du Ministère des Affaires étrangères -MoFA-.
Love Alliance indicators and links with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs -MoFA- basket indicators

# Nombre de politiques officiellement bloquées/retraites (projets de loi, obligations, mesures électorales, règlements, politiques administratives) liées à l'espace et aux libertés civiques ou à la (dé)criminalisation.
# of Policies formally blocked/retracted (bills, bonds, ballot measures, regulations, administrative policies) related to either civic space and freedoms or (de)criminalisation
